# factorial
Compute factorial with Python

## How to use

`> python .\factorial.py NUMBER [args]`

args:
- `-w`: Show calculation process
- `-f`: Output result into file (`.\factorial.txt`)

## Examples

```
> python .\factorial.py 1024
100%|█████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████| 1024/1024 [00:00<00:00, 1021152.47it/s]
1024: 
```

```
> python .\factorial.py 16 -w
1: 1
2: 2
3: 6
4: 24
5: 120
6: 720
7: 5040
8: 40320
9: 362880
10: 3628800
11: 39916800
12: 479001600
13: 6227020800
14: 87178291200
15: 1307674368000
16: 20922789888000
```

```
python .\factorial.py 262144 -f
100%|██████████████████████████████████████████████████████| 262144/262144 [00:33<00:00, 7747.39it/s]
```
